verses.roman:
rāmānanda-rāyera ei kahilu guṇa-leśa
pradyumna miśrere yaiche kailā upadeśa

synonyms: rāmānanda-rāyera—of Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya; ei—this; kahilu—I have spoken; guṇa-leśa—a fraction of the transcendental attributes; pradyumna miśrere—unto Pradyumna Miśra; yaiche—in which way; kailā upadeśa—he gave instruction.
translation: I have described but a fraction of the transcendental attributes of Rāmānanda Rāya, as revealed when he instructed Pradyumna Miśra.
